block.p: An article on Saturday about the opening in San Antonio of the Museo Alameda, the nation's largest Latino museum, misstated the amount of the largest donation for the museum and its source. It was $5.5 million, not $5 million, from the Ford Motor Company and the Ford Motor Company Fund -- not from the company and the Ford Foundation. Also, a picture caption referred incorrectly to Henry R. Muñoz III, who raised much of the money for the museum. He is an executive of an architectural firm, not an architect.
